釘.definition: to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points; to nail; to pin; to staple; to sew on

釘子戶.definition: householder who refuses to vacate his home despite pressure from property developers

釘是釘，鉚是鉚.pinyin: ding1 shi4 ding1 , mao3 shi4 mao3
釘是釘，鉚是鉚.definition: lit. a nail is a nail and a rivet is a rivet (idiom); fig. meticulous; conscientious; unambiguous

釘書針.definition: staple (variant of 訂書針|订书针[ding4 shu1 zhen1])

釘梢.definition: to follow sb; to tail; to shadow; also written 盯梢[ding1 shao1]

釘死.definition: to nail securely; to execute by means of impalement; to crucify

釘牢.definition: to clinch (a nail); to nail down

釘釘.definition: DingTalk, business communication platform developed by Alibaba
